analysis.description:
Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/23/0xe6cf54ef77ad3616274a1ac6c62ed1b8814231a4.sol#226-228) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/23/0xe6cf54ef77ad3616274a1ac6c62ed1b8814231a4.sol#227-228)

TimedCrowdsale.constructor (/unique_chucks/23/0xe6cf54ef77ad3616274a1ac6c62ed1b8814231a4.sol#348-357) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_openingTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/23/0xe6cf54ef77ad3616274a1ac6c62ed1b8814231a4.sol#351)

TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (/unique_chucks/23/0xe6cf54ef77ad3616274a1ac6c62ed1b8814231a4.sol#360-363) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > closingTime (/unique_chucks/23/0xe6cf54ef77ad3616274a1ac6c62ed1b8814231a4.sol#362)

MoleculeCrowdsale._preValidatePurchase (/unique_chucks/23/0xe6cf54ef77ad3616274a1ac6c62ed1b8814231a4.sol#982-1007) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > openingTime + (2419200) && block.timestamp <= openingTime + (3024000) (/unique_chucks/23/0xe6cf54ef77ad3616274a1ac6c62ed1b8814231a4.sol#1002-1007)
	- block.timestamp > openingTime + (1209600) && block.timestamp <= openingTime + (1814400) (/unique_chucks/23/0xe6cf54ef77ad3616274a1ac6c62ed1b8814231a4.sol#995-1007)
	- block.timestamp <= openingTime + (1209600) (/unique_chucks/23/0xe6cf54ef77ad3616274a1ac6c62ed1b8814231a4.sol#988-1007)
	- block.timestamp > openingTime + (1814400) && block.timestamp <= openingTime + (2419200) (/unique_chucks/23/0xe6cf54ef77ad3616274a1ac6c62ed1b8814231a4.sol#997-1007)

MoleculeCrowdsale._forwardFunds (/unique_chucks/23/0xe6cf54ef77ad3616274a1ac6c62ed1b8814231a4.sol) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= openingTime + (1209600) (/unique_chucks/23/0xe6cf54ef77ad3616274a1ac6c62ed1b8814231a4.sol)
